## IExperimentsJson.usePnpmLockfileOnlyThenFrozenLockfileForRushUpdate property

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

By default, 'rush update' runs as a single operation. Set this option to true to instead update the lockfile with `--lockfile-only`<></>, then perform a `--frozen-lockfile` install. Necessary when using the `afterAllResolved` hook in .pnpmfile.cjs.

**Signature:**

```typescript
usePnpmLockfileOnlyThenFrozenLockfileForRushUpdate?: boolean;
```
